sections.heading: Repealed.Section 30-49-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1993, ch. 244, § 1; 2015, ch. 98, § 1; repealed by Laws 2020, ch. 46, § 26.

Repeals.— Laws 2020, ch. 46, § 26 repealed 30-49-1 NMSA 1978, relating to the short title of the Tobacco Products, E-Cigarette and Nicotine Liquid Container Act, effective January 1, 2021. For provisions of the former section,seethe 2020 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
